title: La hu√©sped
overview: In the midst of the crisis in her marriage to Lorenzo, a candidate for Attorney General, and her daughter Isabela's struggle with methamphetamine addiction, Silvia receives an unexpected visit from Sonia, a woman she met weeks earlier on a solo trip. What began as an unexpected emotional and physical bond turns into a threat: Sonia arrives with a plan to destroy the family from within and take revenge on the person she believes is responsible for all her pain.
